Updated November     pm



The ASUW student senate elected its committee chairpersons during its weekly meeting last night PERIOD The committee chairs will preside over weekly committee meetings while the senate is in session PERIOD Each committee is responsible for an area of student government PERIOD

After two and a half hours the senate decided on the chairpersons and tabled the rest of their agenda until next week PERIOD

The committees will discuss student issues and write resolutions of student opinion to be discussed by the senate as a whole PERIOD

At the beginning of each ASUW studentsenate meeting the senate dedicates between  minutes to an hour to committee meetings PERIOD All senators are able to be voting members of a committee PERIOD

The ASUW meets every Tuesday at  p.m PERIOD in HUB  PERIOD It is open to all interested parties PERIOD

Elected positions are as follows

Academic affairs Argian Beristain  considers issues pertaining to academic life of students as well as facultyrelated issues

Faculty and administrative affairs Joel Merkel  Considers issues on campus that deal directly with the faculty or administration

Campus life Chris Corry  Considers issues affecting students who are not related to academics or legislation

Projects Jasmine Marwaha  Considers issues that do not fit into the framework of other committees
